Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
man-sized \man-sized\ adj. 1. Calling for manly attributes; as, a man-sized job. [WordNet 1.5]
2. Large enough to satisfy a man; as, a man-sized piece of cake. [informal] [WordNet 1.5]
man-sized adj 1: calling for manly attributes; "a man-sized job" 2: appropriate to the size of a man; "a man-sized piece of cake"
